import React from 'react' import { Menu, Icon, Search, Button, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Login from '../components/Login' import Logout from '../components/Logout' import Signup from '../components/Signup' import { changeSearchText } from '../actions/searchbar' import '../images/userIcon.png'; const NavBar = ({loggedIn, changeSearchText, searchText}) => { const handleChange = e => { changeSearchText(e.target.value) } return (
{loggedIn ? : Login } closeIcon> Signup } closeIcon> }
) } const mapStateToProps = ({currentUser, searchbar})=> { return { currentUser, loggedIn: !!currentUser, searchText: searchbar } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, {changeSearchText})(NavBar);
